value.title: Intelligently connect to customers using machine learning in the COVID-19 pandemic
value.excerpt: The pandemic has changed how people interact, how we receive information, and how we get help. It has shifted much of what used to happen in-person to online. value.title: Announcing the AWS DeepComposer Chartbusters challenge, Keep Calm and Model On
value.excerpt: We are back with another AWS DeepComposer Chartbusters challenge, Keep Calm and Model On! This challenge is open for submissions throughout AWS re:Invent until January 31, 2021. In this challenge, you can experiment with our newly launched Transformers algorithm and generate an original piece of music.

value.title: This month in AWS Machine Learning: October edition
value.excerpt: Every day there is something new going on in the world of AWS Machine Learning—from launches to new to use cases to interactive trainings.
